about_the_game:
Time Is Honey is a cozy idle game where your journey begins with opening bee packs to collect and care for a variety of bees. Each bee has its unique charm and contributes to your honey production. Unlock and customize your hives and strategically upgrade to complete your collection with every bee type there is, including the special golden variants.

BEE PACKS


  • 🐝 Open Bee Packs to discover rare and unique Bee Types!
Experience the thrill of uncovering a wide range of unique bees, each with its own cute looks and stats that contribute to your hive's success!

FEED THE BEES


  • 🍯 Feed your bees and get the honey you deserve!
Nurture your bees with care and watch as they repay your efforts with that sweet honey, enhancing both your enjoyment and in-game profits.

UNLOCK THEM ALL


  • 🔓 Complete the whole Beecyclopedia!
Embark on a quest to gather every bee in the game and complete the Beecyclopedia!

name: Time Is Honey Demo
short_description: Time Is Honey is a relaxing idle game where you open packs to discover a variety of unique bees. Take care of them in real-time and then turn it all into profit. Unlock and customize all of the unique hives and enjoy completing your collection of bees.
